headline: Is GE Vernova (GEV) The Best Stock to Ride the AI Data Center Buildout?
summary: We recently published 10 Trending Stocks to Watch as Brad Gerstner Explains Tailwinds for AI Trade – ’10x Manhattan Project’. GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the trending stocks to watch. James Van Geelen, the founder and portfolio manager at Citrini Research, recently investigated the Stargate data center facility in Texas and talked in […]

headline: Tesla, Netflix set to report earnings as US-China trade fight turns 'unsustainable': What to watch this week
summary: As investors enters shutdown week three, a US-China trade war, credit gesticulation, and an incoming oil glut are weighing on the market.
